channel.title: RSS feed for tag bash-bits on Raymii.org
channel.description: RSS feed for tag bash-bits on Raymii.org

item.title: Bash Bits: Simple command line arguments
item.description: Bash Bits are small examples and tips for Bash Scripts. This bash bit shows you how to add command line arguments to your script. It is very simple, non-positional and does not use getopts.

item.title: Bash Bits: Check if item is in array
item.description: Bash Bits are small examples, tips and tutorials for Bash (Scripts). This bash bit shows you how find out if an array has an item.

item.title: Bash Bits: Add colour output to your script
item.description: Bash Bits are small examples, tips and tutorials for Bash (Scripts). This bash bit shows you how to add coloured output to your scripts

item.title: Bash Bits: Debug Logging
item.description: Bash Bits are small examples and tips for Bash Scripts. This bash bit shows you how to add debug logging to a bash script.

item.title: Bash Bits: Trap Control C (SIGTERM)
item.description: Bash Bits are small examples and tips for Bash Scripts. This bash bit shows you how to capture a Control C signal in a bash script, for example, to clean up any temp or pid files when your script is killed or closed.
